title: So let me get this straight, gamers...
body:
You gamers believe videogame violence doesn't cause real violence.

You gamers believe videogame sexism doesn't cause real sexism.

But you gamers, specifically ones who are against the lootboxes and want the government to step in and ban them despite the free market dictating the rise of lootboxes and, soon enough, their eventual downfall, believe videogame """""gambling""""" will cause real gambling in children?
